targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT count("value") FROM /^$SuccessFailure$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM /^$Duration$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("value") FROM /^$SuccessFailure$/ WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

panels.description: Time spent blocked (waiting for a free TCP connection slot) before initiating the request

targets.query: SELECT percentile("value", 95) FROM "http_req_blocked" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: Request blocked time (95%ile)
